summary: This document is a series of daily inmate rosters and official out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, spanning July 23 to August 8, 2019. It primarily tracks the location and attorney visit assignments of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054) and other inmates during the weeks leading up to his death.

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration Record Begins
events.description: First daily roster entry for Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York, showing he is assigned for an attorney visit.

events.title: Epstein Housing Assignment Change
events.description: Epstein's assignment changes from H01-001L to 204-206LAD, indicating a possible move within the facility.

events.title: Final Documented Roster Entry for Epstein
events.description: Last daily roster entry for Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York before his death on August 10, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York under register number 76318-054 from at least July 23, 2019.
The documents show daily administrative tracking of Epstein's location and attorney visit assignments for over two weeks prior to his death.
Epstein's housing assignment changed around July 25, 2019, from H01-001L to 204-206LAD.
The records include numerous other inmates at MCC New York during the same period, such as Tartaglione and Araujo.
These are routine prison administrative forms (Inmate Roster and Official Out Count), providing a timeline of Epstein's final days in custody.
